body: Arts great liked most of the tags. But get that nye outta here this shit is outta character 100% I hate the squatting position on the 22nd page tho. I like it better if I imagine that eren beat those guys up and the manga actually ends like In #132339

What's the point of parody doujins if the characters in them don't reflect what they're actually like in the source material? There's literally 0 chance that Mikasa would just drop Eren like that. Also 0 chance that Eren would just run away while they fuck her.

Haha. Story logic actually has her unbreakable due to bloodline devotion to the holder of a Shifter and that's Eren. Also Eren would start to kick their asses and then setting Mikasa off to instinctively to combat them as well. But then again it's doujinshis so character logic and development are thrown out the window for one man's delusion.
get that ntr shit out of my face
